refnamediv.refpurpose: merge black and white bw images into a color pix file

refsect1.title: DESCRIPTION
refsect1.para: Bw3-pix merges (combines the colors of) bw5 format files into a pix5 file. Bw3-pix reads the specified input files and writes stdout until all files have been exhausted. The first file goes into the red color plane, the second green, the third blue.
Bw3-pix accepts two special filename synonyms: ``-'', which stands for stdin, and ``.'', which stands for /dev/null, the latter of which will write black into the corresponding color plane.
